metadata.Name: ANETAC
metadata.Description: ANETAC is an English-Arabic dataset containing 79,924 named entity triplets (English NE, Arabic transliteration, class: Person, Location, Organization). It was built from parallel corpora for transliteration and named entity classification tasks.
metadata.Paper Title: ANETAC : ARABIC NAMED ENTITY TRANSLITERATION AND CLASSIFICATION DATASET
Affiliations: Department of Computer Science USTHB University Bab-Ezzouar, Algiers, Algeria
Informatics Research Centre University of Salford M5 4WT, United Kingdom
metadata.Abstract: In this paper, we make freely accessible ANETAC 1 our English-Arabic named entity transliteration and classification dataset that we built from freely available parallel translation corpora. The dataset contains 79 924 , instances, each instance is a triplet ( e, a, c ) , where e is the English named entity, a is its Arabic transliteration and c is its class that can be either a Person, a Location, or an Organization. The ANETAC dataset is mainly aimed for the researchers that are working on Arabic named entity transliteration, but it can also be used for named entity classification purposes. This dataset was developed and used as part of a previous research study done by Hadj Ameur et al. [1].
